html:
Verb[edit]

agimur

  1. first-person plural present passive indicative of agō
    1. "we are done, we are made"
    2. "we are accomplished, we are managed, we are achieved"
    3. "we are performed, we are transacted"
    4. "we are driven, we are conducted"
    5. "we are pushed, we are moved, we are impelled"
    6. "we are guided, we are governed, we are administered"
    7. "we are discussed, we are pleaded, we are deliberated"
    8. "we are thought upon"
    9. "we are stirred up, we are excited, we are caused, we are induced"
    10. "we are chased, we are pursued"
    11. (of some courses of action) "we are driven, we are pursued"
    12. "we are robbed, we are stolen, we are plundered, we are carried off"
    13. (of time) "we are passed, we are spent"
    14. (of offerings) "we are slain, we are killed (as a sacrifice)"
    15. (of plants) "we are put forth, we are sprouted, we are extended"
